description: Wario and friends are bringing new ways to play with the Wii U GamePad controller! Use the GamePad creatively whether it’s shielding you from suction-cup arrows, becoming a disco floor for dance battles, or acting as a thief’s best tool against detection. Playing and sharing in the WarioWare fun is an experience you won’t find anywhere else.   Discover a collection of unusual games that stretch the boundaries of traditional “video games.” Use the Wii U GamePad controller in new ways to tackle wildly addictive challenges. In combination with the TV, use the motion-sensing GamePad to skillfully slalom down slopes, fire at invading robots and aliens, and take pictures of suspected felons. Play games to earn bragging rights among your friends and also to earn special coins to redeem for WarioWare prizes. With a wide assortment of truly unique games for everyone, you’ll be coming back again and again.
